src/keyboard_driver.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  *      \file keyboard_driver.c
00003  *
00004  *      \brief This file contains the scancode table for all of the letter and
00005  *                      their combination.
00006  *                      -The incoming scancode of the keyboard select the row
00007  *                      -The modifier status select the column
00008  *                      -The intersection of two is the scan/ASCII code to put into the PC buffer ahead 
00009  *      \author Luciano Zemin, Nicolás Magni, Nicolás Purita
00010  */
00011 
00012 #include "keyboard_driver.h"
00013 
00014 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00015  * Software keycodes
00016  * ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00017 
00018 /*
00019  *      \brief Each keyboard event generates a 16 bit code.
00020  *                      - The low 10 bits indicate which key was used.
00021  *                      - If bit 8 (KEY_SPECIAL_FLAG) is 0, then the low 8 bits contain
00022  *                the ASCII code.
00023  *                      - The flags indicate the shift/alt/control state,
00024  *                and whether the event was a make or release.
00025  */
00026 
00027 static char flag = 0;
00028 static char flagCaps = 0;
00029 static int amountOfRepetition = KEYBOARD_REPETITION;
00030 static int keyboardActivity = 0;
00031 
00032 #define KEY_RSHIFT_P    0x2A
00033 #define KEY_LSHIFT_P    0x36
00034 #define KEY_RSHIFT_R    (KEY_RSHIFT_P + KB_KEY_RELEASE)
00035 #define KEY_LSHIFT_R    (KEY_LSHIFT_P + KB_KEY_RELEASE)
00036 #define KEY_ALT_P               0x38
00037 #define KEY_ALT_R               (KEY_ALT_P + KB_KEY_RELEASE)
00038 #define KEY_CTRL_P              0x1D
00039 #define KEY_CTRL_R              (KEY_CTRL_P+KB_KEY_RELEASE)
00040 #define KEY_CAPS                0x3A
00041 
00042 #define KB_KEY_RELEASE  0x80
00043 #define KB_OUTPUT_FULL  0x01
00044 
00045 #define DATA_PORT               0x60
00046 #define CONTROL_PORT    0x64
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * Flags
00050  */
00051 #define FLAG_SHIFT              (0x01)
00052 #define FLAG_CTRL               (0x02)
00053 #define FLAG_ALT                (0x04)
00054 #define FLAG_CAPS               (0x08)
00055 
00056 #define KEY_SPECIAL_FLAG 0x00
00057 #define KEY_KEYPAD_FLAG  0x00
00058 #define KEY_SHIFT_FLAG   0x1000
00059 #define KEY_ALT_FLAG     0x2000
00060 #define KEY_CTRL_FLAG    0x4000
00061 #define KEY_RELEASE_FLAG 0x8000
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Special key codes
00065  */
00066 
00067 #define _SPECIAL(num) (KEY_SPECIAL_FLAG & (num))
00068 #define KEY_UNKNOWN _SPECIAL(0) 
00069 #define KEY_F1          KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x01
00070 #define KEY_F2      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x02 
00071 #define KEY_F3      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x03 
00072 #define KEY_F4      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x04 
00073 #define KEY_F5      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x05 
00074 #define KEY_F6      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x06
00075 #define KEY_F7      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x07
00076 #define KEY_F8      KB_KEY_RELEASE | 0x08
00077 #define KEY_F9      _SPECIAL(9) 
00078 #define KEY_F10     _SPECIAL(10) 
00079 #define KEY_F11     _SPECIAL(11) 
00080 #define KEY_F12     _SPECIAL(12) 
00081 #define KEY_LCTRL   _SPECIAL(13) 
00082 #define KEY_RCTRL   _SPECIAL(14) 
00083 #define KEY_LSHIFT  _SPECIAL(15) 
00084 #define KEY_RSHIFT  _SPECIAL(16) 
00085 #define KEY_LALT    _SPECIAL(17) 
00086 #define KEY_RALT    _SPECIAL(18) 
00087 #define KEY_PRINTSCRN _SPECIAL(19) 
00088 #define KEY_CAPSLOCK _SPECIAL(20) 
00089 #define KEY_NUMLOCK _SPECIAL(21) 
00090 #define KEY_SCRLOCK _SPECIAL(22) 
00091 #define KEY_SYSREQ  _SPECIAL(23) 
00092 
00093 /*
00094  * Keypad keys
00095  */
00096 #define KEYPAD_START 128
00097 #define _KEYPAD(num) (KEY_KEYPAD_FLAG & KEY_SPECIAL_FLAG & (num+KEYPAD_START))
00098 #define KEY_KPHOME  _KEYPAD(0)
00099 #define KEY_KPUP    _KEYPAD(1)
00100 #define KEY_KPPGUP  _KEYPAD(2)
00101 #define KEY_KPMINUS _KEYPAD(3)
00102 #define KEY_KPLEFT  _KEYPAD(4)
00103 #define KEY_KPCENTER _KEYPAD(5)
00104 #define KEY_KPRIGHT _KEYPAD(6)
00105 #define KEY_KPPLUS  _KEYPAD(7)
00106 #define KEY_KPEND   _KEYPAD(8)
00107 #define KEY_KPDOWN  _KEYPAD(9)
00108 #define KEY_KPPGDN  _KEYPAD(10)
00109 #define KEY_KPINSERT _KEYPAD(11)
00110 #define KEY_KPDEL   _KEYPAD(12)
00111 
00112 #define ASCII_ESC       0x00
00113 #define ASCII_BS        '\b'
00114 #define ASCII_ENTER '\n'
00115 /*
00116  * Translate from scan code to key code, when shift is not pressed.
00117  */
00118 
00119 static const Keycode scanTableNoShift[] = {
00120         KEY_UNKNOWN, ASCII_ESC, '1', '2',   /* 0x00 - 0x03 */
00121         '3', '4', '5', '6',                 /* 0x04 - 0x07 */
00122         '7', '8', '9', '0',                 /* 0x08 - 0x0B */
00123         '-', '=', ASCII_BS, '\t',           /* 0x0C - 0x0F */
00124         'q', 'w', 'e', 'r',                 /* 0x10 - 0x13 */
00125         't', 'y', 'u', 'i',                 /* 0x14 - 0x17 */
00126         'o', 'p', '[', ']',                 /* 0x18 - 0x1B */
00127         ASCII_ENTER, KEY_LCTRL, 'a', 's',   /* 0x1C - 0x1F */
00128         'd', 'f', 'g', 'h',                 /* 0x20 - 0x23 */
00129         'j', 'k', 'l', ';',                 /* 0x24 - 0x27 */
00130         '\'', '`', KEY_LSHIFT, '\\',        /* 0x28 - 0x2B */
00131         'z', 'x', 'c', 'v',                 /* 0x2C - 0x2F */
00132         'b', 'n', 'm', ',',                 /* 0x30 - 0x33 */
00133         '.', '/', KEY_RSHIFT, KEY_PRINTSCRN, /* 0x34 - 0x37 */
00134         KEY_LALT, ' ', KEY_CAPSLOCK, KEY_F1, /* 0x38 - 0x3B */
00135         KEY_F2, KEY_F3, KEY_F4, KEY_F5,     /* 0x3C - 0x3F */
00136         KEY_F6, KEY_F7, KEY_F8, KEY_F9,     /* 0x40 - 0x43 */
00137         KEY_F10, KEY_NUMLOCK, KEY_SCRLOCK, KEY_KPHOME,  /* 0x44 - 0x47 */
00138         KEY_KPUP, KEY_KPPGUP, KEY_KPMINUS, KEY_KPLEFT,  /* 0x48 - 0x4B */
00139         KEY_KPCENTER, KEY_KPRIGHT, KEY_KPPLUS, KEY_KPEND,  /* 0x4C - 0x4F */
00140         KEY_KPDOWN, KEY_KPPGDN, KEY_KPINSERT, KEY_KPDEL,  /* 0x50 - 0x53 */
00141         KEY_SYSREQ, KEY_UNKNOWN, KEY_UNKNOWN, KEY_UNKNOWN,  /* 0x54 - 0x57 */
00142 };
00143 
00144 #define SCAN_TABLE_SIZE (sizeof(s_scanTableNoShift) / sizeof(Keycode))
00145 
00146 /*
00147  * \brief       Translate from scan code to key code, when shift *is* pressed.
00148  *                      Keep this in sync with the unshifted table above!
00149  *                      They must be the same size.
00150  */
00151 static const Keycode scanTableWithShift[] = {
00152         KEY_UNKNOWN, ASCII_ESC, '!', '@',   /* 0x00 - 0x03 */
00153         '#', '$', '%', '^',                 /* 0x04 - 0x07 */
00154         '&', '*', '(', ')',                 /* 0x08 - 0x0B */
00155         '_', '=', ASCII_BS, '\t',           /* 0x0C - 0x0F */
00156         'Q', 'W', 'E', 'R',                 /* 0x10 - 0x13 */
00157         'T', 'Y', 'U', 'I',                 /* 0x14 - 0x17 */
00158         'O', 'P', '{', '}',                 /* 0x18 - 0x1B */
00159         ASCII_ENTER, KEY_LCTRL, 'A', 'S',   /* 0x1C - 0x1F */
00160         'D', 'F', 'G', 'H',                 /* 0x20 - 0x23 */
00161         'J', 'K', 'L', ':',                 /* 0x24 - 0x27 */
00162         '"', '~', KEY_LSHIFT, '|',          /* 0x28 - 0x2B */
00163         'Z', 'X', 'C', 'V',                 /* 0x2C - 0x2F */
00164         'B', 'N', 'M', '<',                 /* 0x30 - 0x33 */
00165         '>', '?', KEY_RSHIFT, KEY_PRINTSCRN, /* 0x34 - 0x37 */
00166         KEY_LALT, ' ', KEY_CAPSLOCK, KEY_F1, /* 0x38 - 0x3B */
00167         KEY_F2, KEY_F3, KEY_F4, KEY_F5,     /* 0x3C - 0x3F */
00168         KEY_F6, KEY_F7, KEY_F8, KEY_F9,     /* 0x40 - 0x43 */
00169         KEY_F10, KEY_NUMLOCK, KEY_SCRLOCK, KEY_KPHOME,  /* 0x44 - 0x47 */
00170         KEY_KPUP, KEY_KPPGUP, KEY_KPMINUS, KEY_KPLEFT,  /* 0x48 - 0x4B */
00171         KEY_KPCENTER, KEY_KPRIGHT, KEY_KPPLUS, KEY_KPEND,  /* 0x4C - 0x4F */
00172         KEY_KPDOWN, KEY_KPPGDN, KEY_KPINSERT, KEY_KPDEL,  /* 0x50 - 0x53 */
00173         KEY_SYSREQ, KEY_UNKNOWN, KEY_UNKNOWN, KEY_UNKNOWN,  /* 0x54 - 0x57 */
00174 };

00182 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00183  * Private data and functions

00186 
00187 
00188 void keyboard_driver(){
00189 
00190         Keycode scan = 0, auxScan, oldScanCode=0;
00191         unsigned char status;
00192         int countEnq = 0;
00193         
00194         status = inportb(CONTROL_PORT);
00195         if( (KB_OUTPUT_FULL & status) != 0 )
00196                 scan = inportb(DATA_PORT);                      /* The keyboard is avaliable to read */
00197         SetKeyState(scan);
00198         if( !(scan & KB_KEY_RELEASE)  )
00199         {
00200                 if( flag & FLAG_SHIFT  )
00201                 {
00202                         if( flagCaps & FLAG_CAPS )
00203                         {
00204                                 auxScan = scanTableNoShift[scan];
00205                                 if( auxScan >= 'a' && auxScan <= 'z' )
00206                                 {
00207                                         charEnque(auxScan);
00208                                 }
00209                                 else
00210                                 {       
00211                                         auxScan = scanTableWithShift[scan];
00212                                         if( auxScan != 0 )
00213                                                 charEnque(auxScan);
00214                                 }
00215                         }else
00216                         {
00217                                 auxScan = scanTableWithShift[scan];
00218                                         if( auxScan != 0 )
00219                                                 charEnque(auxScan);
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222                 else if( flag & FLAG_CAPS && (auxScan = scanTableNoShift[scan]) >= 'a' && auxScan <= 'z' )
00223                 {
00224                         auxScan -= 0x20;
00225                         if( auxScan != 0 )
00226                                 charEnque(auxScan);
00227                 }
00228                 else if( flag & FLAG_CTRL && ((auxScan = scanTableNoShift[scan]) == 'c' || (auxScan = scanTableWithShift[scan]) == 'C') )
00229                 {
00230                         charEnque( 0x8A );
00231                 }
00232                 else
00233                 {
00234                         auxScan = scanTableNoShift[scan];
00235                         if( oldScanCode == scan )
00236                                 while( countEnq++ <= amountOfRepetition )
00237                                         charEnque(auxScan);
00238                         else if( auxScan )
00239                                 charEnque(auxScan);
00240                 }
00241 
00242         }
00243         oldScanCode = scan;
00244         keyboardActivity = 1;
00245         refreshKeyboardBufferTTY();
00246 }
00247 
00248 void SetKeyState( Keycode scanCode )
00249 {
00250         switch (scanCode) {
00251                 case KEY_RSHIFT_P: case KEY_LSHIFT_P:
00252                         flag |= FLAG_SHIFT;
00253                         break;
00254                 case KEY_RSHIFT_R: case KEY_LSHIFT_R:
00255                         flag &= ~FLAG_SHIFT;
00256                         break;
00257                 case KEY_CAPS:
00258                         flag = flag ^FLAG_CAPS;
00259                         flagCaps = flagCaps ^FLAG_CAPS;
00260                         break;
00261                 case KEY_CTRL_P:
00262                         flag |= FLAG_CTRL;
00263                         break;
00264                 case KEY_CTRL_R:
00265                         flag &= ~FLAG_CTRL;
00266                         break;
00267                 }
00268 }
00269 
00270 
00271 int shiftIsPressed( void )
00272 {
00273         return flag == FLAG_SHIFT;
00274 }
00275 
00276 int capsIsPressed( void )
00277 {
00278         return flag == FLAG_CAPS;
00279 }
00280 
00281 int ctrlIsPressed ( void )
00282 {
00283         return flag == FLAG_CTRL;
00284 }
00285 
00286 int getRepetition()
00287 {
00288         return amountOfRepetition;
00289 }
00290 
00291 void setRepetition( int newRep )
00292 {
00293         amountOfRepetition = newRep;
00294 }
00295 
00296 int checkKeyboardActivity( void )
00297 {
00298         if( keyboardActivity )
00299         {       
00300                 keyboardActivity = 0;
00301                 return 1;
00302         }
00303         return 0;
00304 }
00305 
00306 void setKeyboardActivity(void)
00307 { 
00308         keyboardActivity = 0;
00309 }
